verbose_text: LDH-C accounts for 80-100% of the LDH activity in human spermatozoa, catalyzing the reversible conversion of pyruvate to lactate with the concomitant conversion of nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide (NADH) to NAD + during lactic acid fermentation.
evidence: LDH-C accounts for 80-100% of the LDH activity in human spermatozoa                           , catalyzing the reversible conversion of pyruvate to lactate
